title: Luke Burgess and his bikini-clad new girlfriend look loved-up in Mexico
text:
They put on an amorous display during a boozy cruise in Mexico on Friday.

And retired rugby league player Luke Burgess and his new girlfriend, Arianna Vidgen, looked smitten as they left their hotel the same day.

The couple stayed close as they strolled around in their holiday attire.

Romance south of the border! Luke Burgess and his bikini-clad new girlfriend were seen emerging from their Mexican hotel after enjoying a boozy cruise with his newly single brother Samm last Friday

Product developer Arianna showed off her incredible figure in a red strapless bikini paired with white drawstring shorts, while former South Sydney Rabbitohs flaunted his buff frame in a mismatched Hawaiian print shirt and shorts.

The strapping 32-year-old sportsman revealed his tattoo sleeve in the attire, and also added a fedora hat to his ensemble.

The pair are in Mexico to celebrate the 50th birthday of Sean Garlick, alongside Luke's newly single brother, Sam.

Feeling hot, hot, hot: Product developer Arianna showed off her incredible figure in a red strapless bikini paired with white drawstring shorts

They were seen putting on an amorous display during a boozy cruise earlier in the day, while Sam appeared to be enjoying the company of a number of female partygoers on board.

Luke ended his relationship with the mother of his child, Yolanda Hodgson, back in January.

But almost a year later, he appears to have found love once again with Arianna.

Luke hasn't publicly spoke out about their romance, but he first featured on her Instagram page back in August this year.

On holiday time: Former South Sydney Rabbitohs flaunted his buff frame in a mismatched Hawaiian print shirt and shorts

Since then, the genetically-blessed couple have posed for a string of cute photos - most recently dressed entirely in white for a couples snap in Cabo, San Lucas.

Earlier in the year, Luke ended his relationship with Yolanda - who he shares a five-year-old daughter, Grace, with - after seven years together.

He began dating British beauty Lindsey Johnson just weeks later, but sadly their short-lived romance didn't last.
description: They put on an amorous display during a boozy cruise for in Mexico on Friday.
authors: Jade Watkins For Daily Mail Australia
